Ability.Name: Missile Blast
Ability.Description: Deals <<1>> kinetic damage to the primary target and <<2>> kinetic damage to up to 7 standard or weak enemies within 5 meters of the primary target. If the primary target is a standard or weak enemy, it is knocked to the ground.

Ability.Name: Rail Shot
Ability.Description: Fires a very powerful shot at the target that deals <<1>> weapon damage. Only usable against incapacitated targets or targets suffering from periodic damage. Deals additional damage if dual wielding.

Ability.Name: Shield Cannon

Description.OldValue: Damaging a target with your Shoulder Cannon missiles heals you for 5% of your total health.

Ability.Description: Damaging a target with your Shoulder Cannon missiles heals you for 3% of your total health.

Ability.Name: Suppressive Tools

Description.OldValue: Magnetic Blast, Flame Burst, and Flame Sweep reduce the movement speed of affected targets by 30% for 6 seconds.

Ability.Description: Magnetic Blast, Flame Burst, and Flame Sweep reduce the movement speed of affected targets by 30% for 3 seconds.

Ability.Name: Powered Charge
Ability.Description: Charges or strikes the target, dealing <<1>> weapon damage, heals for 25% of damage dealt and generates a moderate amount of threat.

Ability.Name: Power Charge
Ability.Description: Your creature lunges at the target and delivers a powerful headswipe, dealing <<1>> weapon damage, heals for 25% of damage dealt and generates a moderate amount of threat.

Ability.Name: Powered Charge
Ability.Description: Charges or strikes the target, dealing <<1>> tech damage, healing for the amount of damage dealt and generates a moderate amount of threat.

Ability.Name: Powered Charge
Ability.Description: Charges or strikes the target, dealing <<1>> tech damage, healing for the amount of damage dealt and generates a moderate amount of threat.

Ability.Name: Powered Charge
Ability.Description: Charges or strikes the target, dealing <<1>> weapon damage, heals for 25% of damage dealt and generates a moderate amount of threat.

Ability.Name: Kolto Scan Process

Description.OldValue: Slowly heals the target for <<1>> over 0 seconds and cleanses physical and mental effects each time it heals the target.

Ability.Description: Slowly heals the target for <<1>> over 9 seconds and cleanses physical and mental effects each time it heals the target.

Ability.Name: Powered Charge
Ability.Description: Charges or strikes the target, dealing <<1>> weapon damage, heals for 25% of damage dealt and generates a moderate amount of threat.

Ability.Name: Powered Charge
Ability.Description: Charges or strikes the target, dealing <<1>> weapon damage, heals for 25% of damage dealt and generates a moderate amount of threat.

Ability.Name: Threatening Strike
Ability.Description: Charges or strikes the target, dealing <<1>> weapon damage, heals for 25% of damage dealt and generates a moderate amount of threat.

Ability.Name: Threatening Strike
Ability.Description: Charges or strikes the target, dealing <<1>> weapon damage, heals for 25% of damage dealt and generates a moderate amount of threat.

Ability.Description: Charges or strikes the target, dealing <<1>> weapon damage, heals for 25% of damage dealt and generates a moderate amount of threat.

Ability.Name: Powered Charge
Ability.Description: Charges or strikes the target, dealing <<1>> weapon damage, heals for 25% of damage dealt and generates a moderate amount of threat.

Ability.Name: Powered Charge
Ability.Description: Charges or strikes the target, dealing <<1>> weapon damage, heals for 25% of damage dealt and generates a moderate amount of threat.

Ability.Name: Threatening Strike
Ability.Description: Charges or strikes the target, dealing <<1>> weapon damage, heals for 25% of damage dealt and generates a moderate amount of threat.

Ability.Name: Threatening Strike
Ability.Description: Charges or strikes the target, dealing <<1>> weapon damage, heals for 25% of damage dealt and generates a moderate amount of threat.

Ability.Name: Threatening Strike
Ability.Description: Charges or strikes the target, dealing <<1>> weapon damage, heals for 25% of damage dealt and generates a moderate amount of threat.

Ability.Name: Stomp
Ability.Description: Deals minor kinetic damage and knocks back all enemies within 8 meters.

Ability.Name: Ranged Attack
Ability.Description: (Standard attack for Battle Droid)

Ability.Name: Iknayid

Description.OldValue: Summons a small iknayid which will follow and passively observe you on your adventures.

Ability.Description: Summons a small Iknayid which will follow and passively observe you on your adventures.

Ability.Name: Benevolence
Ability.Description: Heals a friendly target for <<1>> health.

Ability.Name: Force Armor
Ability.Description: Surrounds the target in a Force shield that absorbs a high amount of damage and lasts 30 seconds. The target becomes Force-imbalanced and cannot benefit from Force Armor again for 20 seconds.

Ability.Name: Rejuvenate
Ability.Description: Immediately heals a target for a <<1>>, plus an additional <<2>> over 9 seconds.

Ability.Name: Force in Balance

Description.OldValue: Deals <<1>> internal damage and redistributes life from affected targets to heal you for 10% of the damage dealt. Strikes up to 8 targets within an 8-meter radius.

Ability.Description: Deals <<1>> internal damage and redistributes life from affected targets to heal you for 10% of the damage dealt. Strikes up to 8 targets within an 5-meter radius.

Ability.Name: Force Serenity
Ability.Description: Redistributes life from an enemy, dealing <<1>> internal damage to the target and healing you for 50% of the damage dealt.

Ability.Name: Deliverance
Ability.Description: Heals a friendly target for <<1>> health.

Ability.Name: Healing Trance

Description.OldValue: Heals a friendly target for <<1>> health and consumes 48 Force over the channel duration.

Ability.Description: Heals a friendly target for <<1>> health and consumes 60 Force over the channel duration.

Ability.Name: Renewal
Ability.Description: 1 second after refreshing your Rejuvenate on a target, the target will be healed for <<1>> health plus any healing that remained from the previous Rejuvenate.

Ability.Name: Salvation
Ability.Description: Applies a periodic healing effect to up to 8 allies within 8 meters of the targeted area, which heals for <<1>> over 10 seconds. Once a target has received the periodic healing effect, the target may leave the area and will continue to be healed by the effect.

Ability.Name: Wandering Mend
Ability.Description: Places a mending Force on a friendly target that heals them for <<1>> health the next time they take damage. After healing the target, Wandering Mend travels to another friendly target within 20 meters. Wandering Mend lasts up to 30 seconds on each target and travels up to 3 times, healing up to 4 targets. Wandering Mend can only be placed on one target at a time.

Ability.Name: Opening Pack

Description.OldValue: Right-click to open this Avenger Alliance Pack. This pack contains 4 items, including: 2 from Armor Lootboxes, Mounts or Vehicles, Weapons, Crystals, Stronghold Decorations, or a Creature Companion, 1 companion gift, and 1 scrap material.

Ability.Description: Right-click to open this Revenge Pack. This pack contains 4 items, including: 2 from Armor Lootboxes, Mounts or Vehicles, Weapons, Crystals, Stronghold Decorations, Titles, Pets, Tunings, a Droid Companion, or the Grand Chance Cube, 1 Companion Gift, and 1 Scrap material.

Ability.Name: Give Gift To Companion
Ability.Description: Give a gift to your companion to increase your influence with them.

Ability.Name: Give Treat To Companion
Ability.Description: Give a treat to your companion to increase your influence with them.

Ability.Name: Give Treat To Companion
Ability.Description: Give a Treat to your herbivore companion to increase your influence with them.

Ability.Name: Perform Maintenance on Companion
Ability.Description: Perform Maintenance on your companion to increase your influence with them.

Ability.Name: Corellian Stardrive Spark

Description.OldValue:
Activates the Corellian Stardrive Spark, increasing movement speed and offering excellent protection against being knocked off. Movement speed increases based on the rank of your Speeder Piloting skill.
Use the Mount Flourish Key binding to activate this mount's flourish.
Speeder Piloting Rank 1: 90% Speeder Piloting Rank 2: 100% Speeder Piloting Rank 3: 110%

Ability.Description:
Activates the Corellian Stardrive Spark, increasing movement speed and offering excellent protection against being knocked off. Movement speed increases based on the rank of your Speeder Piloting skill.
Use the Mount Flourish Key binding to activate this mount's flourish.
Speeder Piloting Rank 1: 90% Speeder Piloting Rank 2: 100% Speeder Piloting Rank 3: 110%

Ability.Name: Aratech Verdant

Description.OldValue:
Activates the Aratech Verdant, increasing movement speed and offering excellent protection against being knocked off. Movement speed increases based on the rank of your Speeder Piloting skill.
Speeder Piloting Rank 1: 90% Speeder Piloting Rank 2: 100% Speeder Piloting Rank 3: 110%

Ability.Description:
Activates the Aratech Verdant, increasing movement speed and offering excellent protection against being knocked off. Movement speed increases based on the rank of your Speeder Piloting skill.
Speeder Piloting Rank 1: 90% Speeder Piloting Rank 2: 100% Speeder Piloting Rank 3: 110%

Ability.Name: Dark Heal
Ability.Description: Heals a friendly target for <<1>> health.

Ability.Name: Resurgence
Ability.Description: Immediately heals the target for <<1>>, plus an additional <<2>> over 9 seconds.

Ability.Name: Dark Infusion
Ability.Description: Heals a friendly target for <<1>> health.

Ability.Name: Innervate

Description.OldValue: Heals a friendly target for <<1>> health and consumes 48 Force over the channel duration.

Ability.Description: Heals a friendly target for <<1>> health and consumes 60 Force over the channel duration.

Ability.Name: Renewal
Ability.Description: 1 second after refreshing your Resurgence on a target, the target will be healed for <<1>> health plus any healing that remained from the previous Resurgence.

Ability.Name: Revivification
Ability.Description: Applies a periodic healing effect to up to 8 allies within 8 meters of the targeted area, which heals for <<1>> over 10 seconds. Once a target has received the periodic healing effect, the target may leave the area and will continue to be healed by the effect.

Ability.Name: Roaming Mend
Ability.Description: Places a mending Force on a friendly target that heals them for <<1>> health the next time they take damage. After healing the target, Roaming Mend travels to another friendly target within 20 meters. Roaming Mend lasts up to 30 seconds on each target and travels up to 3 times, healing up to 4 targets. Roaming Mend can only be placed on one target at a time.

Ability.Name: Death Field

Description.OldValue: Creates a death field at the target location, dealing <<1>> internal damage and stealing life from affected targets to heal you for 10% of the damage dealt. Strikes up to 8 targets within an 8-meter radius.

Ability.Description: Creates a death field at the target location, dealing <<1>> internal damage and stealing life from affected targets to heal you for 10% of the damage dealt. Strikes up to 8 targets within an 5-meter radius.

Ability.Name: Force Leech
Ability.Description: Steals life from an enemy, dealing <<1>> internal damage to the target and healing you for 50% of the damage dealt.

Ability.Name: Static Barrier
Ability.Description: Surrounds the target in a lightning shield that lasts 30 seconds and absorbs a high amount of damage. The target becomes deionized and cannot benefit from Static Barrier again for 20 seconds.

Ability.Name: Explosive Round
Ability.Description: Fires a heavy round that deals <<1>> kinetic damage to the primary target and <<2>> kinetic damage to up to 7 standard or weak targets within 5 meters of the primary target. If the primary target is a weak or standard enemy, it is knocked to the ground.

Ability.Name: High Impact Bolt
Ability.Description: Fires a very powerful round at the target, dealing <<1>> weapon damage. Only usable against incapacitated targets and targets suffering from periodic damage.

Ability.Name: Entangling Tools

Description.OldValue: Tactical Surge, Ion Pulse, and Explosive Surge reduce the movement speed of affected targets by 30% for 6 seconds.

Ability.Description: Tactical Surge, Ion Pulse, and Explosive Surge reduce the movement speed of affected targets by 30% for 3 seconds.

Ability.Name: Guard Cannon

Description.OldValue: Damaging a target with your Shoulder Cannon missiles heals you for 5% of your total health.

Ability.Description: Damaging a target with your Shoulder Cannon missiles heals you for 3% of your total health.

Ability.Name: Tactical Missile
Ability.Description: Fires a missile that hits all hostiles 4m around the enemy target dealing <<1>> weapon damage to up to 5 targets.

Ability.Name: Calculated Precision
Ability.Description: Fires a precision shot to a target with less than 30% health, dealing <<1>> weapon damage.

Ability.Name: Electro Dart
Ability.Description: Fires an electro dart stunning the target for 5 seconds.

Ability.Name: Blast
Ability.Description: A powerful shot dealt to a single target, dealing <<1>> weapon damage.

Ability.Name: Deploy Toxins Canister
Ability.Description: Drains the target by dealing <<1>> weapon damage over a 10 second duration and causing the target to become sundered. Sundered targets have their armor reduced by 20% for 45 seconds.

Ability.Name: Kolto Area Scan
Ability.Description: Bursts an area 8m wide area with a soothing, lingering Kolto cloud. Heals for <<1>> health over 6 seconds.

Ability.Name: Progressive Kolto Scan
Ability.Description: Heals a friendly target for <<1>> over 3 seconds.

Ability.Name: Quick Kolto Burst
Ability.Description: Executes a quick Kolto scan on the target, healing for <<1>>.

Ability.Name: Kolto Scan Process
Ability.Description: Slowly heals the target for <<1>> over 9 seconds and cleanses physical and mental effects each time it heals the target.

Ability.Name: Electro-Stasis
Ability.Description: Binds the target in a stasis field for up to 8 seconds. Damage to the target causes this effect to end prematurely. Targets may only be affected by Electro-Stasis once every 30 seconds. Target must not be suffering from periodic damage and have greater than 90% max health.

Ability.Name: Preventative Protocol
Ability.Description: Places a Kolto-powered shield around the target, preventing a moderate amount of damage for up to 20 seconds.

Ability.Name: Electronics Overload
Ability.Description: Activates an explosive that deals <<1>> kinetic damage to up to 5 enemies 5m around the user. Generates a moderate amount of threat and reduces incoming damage by 50% for 10 seconds. Does not hit sleeping, lifted, or incapacitated enemies.

Ability.Name: Multi-Grapple
Ability.Description: Fires a multi-grapple line that fires in a wide cone in front of the companion and pulls the closest three targets and generates a high amount of threat. Only affects targets that are in combat and are not in cover or have Boss Immunity.

Ability.Name: Provoking Flare
Ability.Description: Fires a flare taunting attacking enemies forcing them to attack your companion and generates a moderate amount of threat.

Ability.Name: Powered Shot
Ability.Description: Blasts the target, dealing <<1>> weapon damage, heals for 25% of damage dealt and generates a moderate amount of threat.

Ability.Name: Reinforcing Taunt
Ability.Description: Taunts the target, forcing it to attack the companion for 6 seconds. Also reinforces the companion by placing an absorb shield that absorbs a moderate amount of damage.

Ability.Name: Anti-Walker Rocket
Ability.Description: Fires a Mandalorian "Walker Buster" rocket which seriously damages a walker and makes them susceptible to damage.

Ability.Name: Mandalorian Droid Popper
Ability.Description: Throws an EMP grenade that electrifies the target area, dealing elemental damage over 5 seconds to up to 8 targets within 5 meters and slowing all affected targets by 70%. Stuns weak and standard droids.

Ability.Name: Mandalorian Warrior
Ability.Description: Summons a Mandalorian warrior to aid you.

Ability.Name: Force Charge
Ability.Description: Charges the enemy, immobilizing it for 1.5 seconds and dealing low damage.

Ability.Name: Force Lightning
Ability.Description: Deals <<1>> energy damage to the target and consumes 40 Force over the duration of the channel. Also slows the movement speed of the target by 50% and immobilizes weak and standard enemies.

Ability.Name: Guard Break
Ability.Description: Channel force energy through the ground at your target, causing energy to erupt upwards under your target's feet. This attack cannot be stopped by a raised shield.

Ability.Name: Raise/Lower Shield
Ability.Description: Raising your shield blocks ability use and slows movement speed, but lets you block or redirect attacks in your forward arc.

Ability.Name: Shield Bash
Ability.Description: Slam your shield into an enemy in front of you, discharging any force energy absorbed by the shield into your target.

Ability.Name: Shockwave
Ability.Description:
Deals moderate kinetic damage and knocks back all enemies within 8 meters.
NOTE - Balanced for Caster NPCs

Ability.Name: Valkorion's Favor
Ability.Description: Valkorion's mark upon you has activated, reacting to Arcann's presence. Passively regenerates between 1% and 10% of your maximum health every second, based upon how injured you are.

Ability.Name: Underworld Miniprobe
Ability.Description: Summons a small probe droid which will follow and passively observe you on your adventures.

Ability.Name: Pale Skarkla
Ability.Description: Summons a small Pale Skarkla which will follow and passively observe you on your adventures.

Ability.Name: Activating Requisition...
Ability.Description: Activates your droid operator requisition.

Ability.Name: Open Box
Ability.Description: This box contains a complete armor set.

Ability.Name: Using Instant
Ability.Description: Instantly uses the placeable and triggers the "On Use" hook.

Ability.Name: Scorched Chemilizard
Ability.Description:
Calls your Scorched Chemilizard mount. Movement speed increases based on the rank of your Speeder Piloting skill.
Speeder Piloting Rank 1: 90% Speeder Piloting Rank 2: 100% Speeder Piloting Rank 3: 110%

Ability.Name: Frontline Gapillian
Ability.Description:
Calls your Frontline Gapillian mount. Movement speed increases based on the rank of your Speeder Piloting skill.
Speeder Piloting Rank 1: 90% Speeder Piloting Rank 2: 100% Speeder Piloting Rank 3: 110%

Ability.Name: Korrealis Regent
Ability.Description:
Activates the Korrealis Regent landspeeder, increasing movement speed and offering exceptional protection against being knocked off. Movement speed increases based on the rank of your Speeder Piloting skill.
Speeder Piloting Rank 1: 90% Speeder Piloting Rank 2: 100% Speeder Piloting Rank 3: 110%

Ability.Description:

Ability.Description:
Activates the Roche Champion, increasing movement speed and offering excellent protection against being knocked off. Movement speed increases based on the rank of your Speeder Piloting skill.
Speeder Piloting Rank 1: 90% Speeder Piloting Rank 2: 100% Speeder Piloting Rank 3: 110%

Ability.Name: Vectron Enforcer
Ability.Description:
Activates the Vectron Enforcer, increasing movement speed and offering excellent protection against being knocked off. Movement speed increases based on the rank of your Speeder Piloting skill. Use the Mount Flourish Key binding to activate this mount's flourish.
Speeder Piloting Rank 1: 90% Speeder Piloting Rank 2: 100% Speeder Piloting Rank 3: 110%

Ability.Name: Eternal Empire Patroller
Ability.Description:
Activates the Eternal Empire Patroller, increasing movement speed and offering excellent protection against being knocked off. Movement speed increases based on the rank of your Speeder Piloting skill.
Speeder Piloting Rank 1: 90% Speeder Piloting Rank 2: 100% Speeder Piloting Rank 3: 110%
